channel.title: Bootstrap on blog

item.title: Picking a custom search engine for your website
item.description: First, if you’d like to and see this blog entry in its original context, then read my original stackoverflow answer here. So, according to blogdown authors (Xie et al. 2018), it’s been said before that, “If you don’t have a website nowadays, you don’t exist” –Carlos Scheidegger. A quick search online returns blog posts and sites with several variations on this them (e.g. here and here) acknowledging the axiomatic importance of an online presence these days.
